                                              YES WE SEE ALL

Assassin&#039;s Creed - Full Multi language ISO - Precracked (Reloaded)

  The first game in the Assassin&#039;s Creed franchise is set in 1191 AD, when the
  Third Crusade was tearing the Holy Land apart. Shrouded in secrecy and 
  feared for their ruthlessness, the Assassins intend to stop the hostilities
  by suppressing both sides of the conflict. Players, assuming the role of 
  the main character Altair, will have the power to throw their immediate 
  environment into chaos and to shape events during this pivotal moment in 
  history.

this is for all those poor sods who like us were messin with assasins only to find time and time again
that we had a bugged version that claimed to be the real thing

It works, it&#039;s full and all you have to do is mount/burn and install.

Thnx to reloaded for the working fixed exe&#039;s.

Greets to the peeps who make this community happen you know who you are and for all our sakes seed 
people seed like you never seeded before


                            we love you all      enjoy the killin i know i do!


  1. Unrar.
  2. Burn/Mount the image. Note to burn this you will need dual layer DVD-R or similar.
  3. Install the game.
  4. Skip the registration process at end of install.
  5. There is no step 5
  6. Either disable your internet connection or block access using your personal firewall.
		This is important as the game tries to check for updates and most likely any updates
            released will break this version!
  7. Play the game
  8. Give thanks to aLL sEEING eYE
  5. Ah there&#039;s step 5! 


you will also find a folder that lets you optionaly remove the long winded logo and intro movies and
